text: Lepidopleurus otagoensis is a species of chiton in the family Leptochitonidae. ==References== * Powell A. W. B., New Zealand Mollusca, William Collins Publishers Ltd, Auckland, New Zealand 1979 Category:Leptochitonidae Category:Chitons of New Zealand Category:Molluscs described in 1929
title: Lepidopleurus otagoensis
